org.corfudb.runtime.view

Interface ICorfuDBInstance

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalCorfuDBInstance

    public interface ICorfuDBInstance
    This interface represents a CorfuDB instance. A CorfuDB instance contains the following: * A Configuration Master, used for configuring the instance. * A Sequencer, used for issuing tokens (which may be streaming or non streaming). * A WriteOnceAddressSpace, the persistent storage area for the log.

      • openStream

        default IStream openStream(UUID id)
        Opens a stream given its identifier using this instance, or creates it on this instance if one does not exist.
        Parameters:
        id - The unique ID of the stream to be opened.
        Returns:
        The stream, if it exists. Otherwise, a new stream is created using this instance.

      • openStream

        IStream openStream(UUID id,
                   EnumSet<ICorfuDBInstance.OpenStreamFlags> flags)
        Opens a stream given its identifier using this instance, using the flags given.
        Parameters:
        id - The unique ID of the stream to be opened.
        flags - The flags to apply to this stream open operation.
        Returns:
        The stream, if it exists. Otherwise, a new stream is created using this instance.

      • deleteStream

        boolean deleteStream(UUID id)
        Delete a stream given its identifier using this instance.
        Parameters:
        id - The unique ID of the stream to be deleted.
        Returns:
        True, if the stream was successfully deleted, or false if there was an error deleting the stream (does not exist).

      • getStreamMetadataMap

        Map<UUID,IStreamMetadata> getStreamMetadataMap()
        Retrieves the stream metadata map for this instance.
        Returns:
        The stream metadata map for this instance.

      • openObject

        default <T extends ICorfuDBObject> T openObject(UUID id,
                                                Class<T> type,
                                                Class<?>... args)
        Retrieves a corfuDB object.
        Parameters:
        id - A unique ID for the object to be retrieved.
        type - The type of object to instantiate.
        args - A list of arguments to pass to the constructor.
        Returns:
        A CorfuDB object. A cached object may be returned if one already exists in the system. A new object will be created if one does not already exist.

      • resetAllCaches

        void resetAllCaches()
        Reset any caches that this instance might hold.

      • openObject

        default <T extends ICorfuDBObject> T openObject(UUID id)
        Retrieves the cached corfuDB object without requiring type knowledge.
        Parameters:
        id - A unique ID for the object to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        Returns a cached object, if it exists. Otherwise null.

      • openObject

        <T extends ICorfuDBObject> T openObject(UUID id,
                                        ICorfuDBInstance.OpenObjectArgs<T> oArgs,
                                        Class<?>... args)
        Retrieves a corfuDB object.
        Parameters:
        id - A unique ID for the object to be retrieved.
        args - A list of arguments to pass to the constructor.
        Returns:
        A CorfuDB object. A cached object may be returned if one already exists in the system. A new object will be created if one does not already exist.

      • executeTransaction

        <T> T executeTransaction(Class<? extends ITransaction> type,
                         ITransactionCommand<T> command)
        Executes a transaction against the CorfuDB instance.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The return type of the transaction.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of transaction to execute.
        command - The command to run in the transaction.
        Returns:
        The value returned in the transaction.

      • invalidateView

        void invalidateView()
        Invalidate the current view, requiring that the view be refreshed.
